attributes.action: Establish a voting system for the electorate to decide who should be awarded honours.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The honours system has fast become farcical with the general public having a very limited voice on who is awarded honours such as Knighthoods.  Honours should be given to people who their fellow countrymen are proud to call countrymen no matter what field they operate in and for no other reason.
